io.analytics.repository.interfaces

Interface IGoogleAccountRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GoogleAccountRepository

    public interface IGoogleAccountRepository

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GoogleAccount addGoogleAccount(GoogleAccount account)
      Adds a new Google Account into the database.
      boolean addRelationshipToAccount(int googleAccountId, int accountId)
      Adds an access relationship between a Google Account and an Account.
      java.util.List<GoogleAccount> getGoogleAccountsForOwner(int ownerId)
      Retrieves a list of Google accounts owned by one particular user.

    • Method Detail

      • addGoogleAccount

        GoogleAccount addGoogleAccount(GoogleAccount account)
        Adds a new Google Account into the database. The GoogleAccount must have a refresh token and an owner id set in order to add it to the database.
        Parameters:
        account - The GoogleAccount to add to the database.
        Returns:
        Returns true on success, false otherwise.

      • getGoogleAccountsForOwner

        java.util.List<GoogleAccount> getGoogleAccountsForOwner(int ownerId)
        Retrieves a list of Google accounts owned by one particular user. Note that this is different from a list of Google Accounts associated with one particular Account.
        Parameters:
        ownerId - The User id that you are trying to find Google Accounts for.
        Returns:
        A List of GoogleAccounts, which may be empty if none are found.

      • addRelationshipToAccount

        boolean addRelationshipToAccount(int googleAccountId,
                               int accountId)
        Adds an access relationship between a Google Account and an Account. The given Account will be given access to the provided Google Account.
        Parameters:
        googleAccountId - The Google Account ID.
        accountId - The Account ID.
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise.
